question_text: Why might a developer choose PaaS over IaaS?
answer_options: PaaS provides direct access to hypervisor configuration
PaaS eliminates the need to maintain an OS or runtime
PaaS allows complete control over hardware access
PaaS offers free open-source physical servers
correct_answer: PaaS eliminates the need to maintain an OS or runtime
explanation: PaaS provides managed infrastructure, including OS and runtime, so developers can focus on building apps.
